sentences.sContent: Made light and high by yeast or other leaven.
sentences.sContent_eng: Made light and high by yeast or other leaven.
sentences.sCn: 发酵的用酵母或其它发酵剂使… 轻而高。

sentences.sContent: These men have been the leaven in the lump of the race.
sentences.sContent_eng: These men have been the leaven in the lump of the race.
sentences.sCn: 如果说这个种族是块面团，这些人便是发酵剂。

synos.tran: 酵母；酵素；潜移默化的影响

remMethod.val: 和heaven (n. 天堂) 一起记

words.tran: 发酵；酵母；引起渐变的因素
